pullRequest.title: Spark: limit the listing depth in RemoveOrphanFilesAction
pullRequest.bodyText: This PR limits the max depth of listing in RemoveOrphanFilesAction.

commit.message: Spark: limit the listing depth in RemoveOrphanFilesAction

nodes.bodyText: Can we use a better message here? I think this will only happen when the maximum depth is reached, so we could state that's what happened: "Could not list location %s, reached maximum subdirectory depth %s", tableLocation, maxDepth
